docs.title: Welcome to Universal Arena
docs.text: Start here for a lightweight guide you can swap out quickly. Replace the placeholder text, add your own images, and expand the sections as you build the card-battler.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This guide covers the essentials of playing Universal Arena. Keep the examples lean, swap the TODOs with real data, and use the filters to help readers navigate.

docs.title: How To Play
docs.text:
1. Build a deck with characters and their cards.
  2. Play cards each turn by spending Energy; build Ultimate Meter to unleash ultimates.
  3. Track Keywords and Conditions to maximize your combos.

Name: Rover

Version: Spectro

Innate: Gain +1 Ultimate Meter each time this character card is played.

docs.title: Keywords
docs.text:
• Forte: Max 2 Count.
  • Spectro Frazzle: Max 10 Count. At the end of the opponent's turn, deal 5 damage per Count, then reduce Count by 1.

docs.title: Card 1: Strike
docs.text:
Cost: 1 Energy Type: Physical, Attack

Effect: Deal 10 damage. Gain +1 Ultimate Meter.

docs.title: Card 2: Defend
docs.text:
Cost: 1 Energy Type: Physical, Defense

Effect: Gain 10 Shield. Gain +1 Ultimate Meter.

docs.title: Card 3: Resonating Slashes
docs.text:
Cost: 1 Energy Type: Physical, Attack, Slash, Debuff

Effect: Deal 12 damage. Reduce Forte Count by 1, inflict 2 Spectro Frazzle.

docs.title: Card 4: Aftertune
docs.text:
Cost: 1 Energy Type: Physical, Attack, Blunt

Effect: Deal 10 Damage. Gain 1 Forte Bar.

docs.title: Card 5: Instant
docs.text:

Effect: Inflict 1 Stagnant Potency and 2 Count.

docs.title: Ultimate: Echoing Orchestra
docs.text:
Cost: 20 Ultimate Meter Type: Magical, Attack, Blunt, Recovery, Debuff

Effect: Deal 15 damage and heal 15 HP. Inflict 6 Spectro Frazzle Count.
